title: iOS 27: Stability upgrades, smarter Siri and foldable iPhone support tipped
snippet: Apple’s upcoming iOS 27 update is tipped to focus on stability and performance, while introducing new Apple Intelligence features, Siri upgrades, AI powered Health tools, and software changes designed for Apple’s first foldable iPhone.

title: Apple eyes OLED upgrade for iPad Air, iMac and MacBook Air: Report
snippet: Apple is reportedly planning a major shift to OLED displays across iPads and Macs between 2026 and 2028, starting with the iPad mini and MacBook Pro. The iPad Air, iMac and MacBook Air are expected to follow later.

title: iPhone 18 Pro tipped for smaller cutout, new camera tech in fresh leak: All you need to know
snippet: A new leak video by tipster Jon Prosser claims to reveal the iPhone 18 Pro’s full design, hinting at a smaller front cutout, relocated Dynamic Island, camera upgrades, a powerful A20 Pro chip and bold new colour options ahead of a possible 2026 launch. Here is all you need to know.

title: Croma Republic Day Sale: Top deals on iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra and more
snippet: Croma’s Republic Day Sale is now live across India, offering discounts on smartphones, laptops, TVs and appliances. Shoppers can avail bank cashbacks, exchange bonuses, student pricing and special deals on Apple and Samsung devices until January 26.

title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale: 10 best wireless headphones for gym use we trust for sweaty sessions, up to 75% off
snippet: We picked these wireless headphones for gym use for secure fit, sweat resistance, and bass that keeps us moving. In the Amazon Great Republic Day Sale, deals hit up to 75% off, so we train harder.

title: Apple iPhone 17 drops to  ₹47,990 in Croma’s Republic Day Sale? How the deal works
snippet: Croma’s Republic Day Sale brings major discounts across electronics, with the iPhone 17 seeing a sharp price cut. Originally priced at  ₹82,900, Apple’s latest iPhone is now available at an effective price of  ₹47,990 through exchange and bank offers. Here is how the deal works.

title: Vivo X200T vs Oppo Reno 15 Pro: Price, camera, display, battery and more compared
snippet: Vivo will launch the X200T in India targeting camera enthusiasts, competing directly with Oppo Reno 15 Pro. The X200T is expected to start at  ₹59,999, featuring a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC, and a ZEISS camera setup.

title: Vivo X200T India launch imminent: Check leaked price, full specs, and storage variants
snippet: Vivo will launch the X200T in India soon, available on Flipkart. The phone could feature a 6.67-inch AMOLED display and MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC

title: iPhone 17e launching soon: Expected India price, release date, top upgrades and more
snippet: Apple's budget iPhone 17e is expected to debut soon, featuring a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A19 processor, and improved cameras.

title: Moto Watch with 13-day battery and AMOLED display launching in India on 23 January: Check confirmed features and specs
snippet: Motorola will launch its new Moto Watch in India on January 23, featuring a 1.4 inch OLED display, IP68 rating, and advanced health tracking feature. The watch supports Moto AI and dual-frequency GPS.&nbsp;

title: Nano GCC attrition shaped by clearly defined roadmaps
snippet: India’s nano GCCs are diverging, with long-term centres showing 80-88% employee retention, while short-term or contract-led setups face high churn.
